title: Thanasis Veggos in "Thou Vou Bald Agent, Operation Havoc" (1969)

sources.title: Thanasis Veggos in "Thou Vou Bald Agent, Operation Havoc" (1969)
sources.description: Filmmaker Tzimis Paloukas and his men hire Thou-Vou and his associate MAP 31. However, the director covertly intends to film the clumsy secret agents in action and use the footage for a movie.
